Caleb's AUR Packages Package sources for all the AUR packages I officially maintain, co-maintain, or unofficially host modified versions of. Pacman Package Repository To use my Pacman package repository, first add my GPG key to your Pacman keyring: Note if you have trouble with your default key servers not being reachable try adding to the first command. Then add the following repository configuration to your after the community repository. Credits Maintained using aurpublish.
